summary: A writer visits a town that isn't what it appears to be.
cast: Jay Mohr|Lisa Edelstein|Ann Cusack|Ron Canada|Bill Dow|Scott Hylands|Dion Luther|Stephen Tobolowsky|Patricia Drake|Ty Olsson|Robert Moloney|Betty Linde|Frank C. Turner|Susan Bain|Fulvio Cecere|David MacKay|Paul Batten|Benita Ha|Ron Small|Claude Duhamel|Linsea O'Shea|Jenn Griffin|Katharine Tobin|Frederick Pleasure II|Christopher Pearce|Biski Gugushe|Diana Stevan|Jenny Mitchell|Robert Harper|David Smith|Bill Waters
title: Un extraño lugar
